question: One joule of work is said to be done when__:
option1: a force of 1 dyne causes a displacement of 1 cm.
option2: a force of 1 dyne causes a displacement of 1 m.
option3: a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 cm.
option4: a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 m.
answer: a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 m.
explanation: The joule is the unit of energy in the International System of Units. It is equal to the work done on an object when a force of one Newton acts on that object in the direction of the force's motion through a distance of one meter. One joule of work is said to be done when a force of 1 N causes a displacement of 1 m.
